name: Bomber League
description:
A bomberman a little more complex than usual.
Choose your character who has his own special skill, make your choices strategically because you will need it to hope to win in this great Bombers tournament!

Characters:


Each character has his own special skill, a skill that he can only use at specific times by earning enough points.

  • Agent S.: Drops a smoke grenade to smother the bombs in the radius.
  • Ramboum : Launches an atomic bomb that sprays absolutely everyone in its path, beware, it's more than deadly!
  • Icy : throws a modified water bomb. Beware, in reality it's nitrogen and freezes everything in its path, even the blocks are not safe.
  • Raiden : fascinated by electricity and lightning, he created a bomb that could paralyze all his enemies who would cause him even the slightest bit of trouble.

Items:


To add a little more life to the field, we have a few items that might be interesting for anyone in the middle of a fight!
  • Rocket launcher: Shoots and destroys all the blocks in its path until it explodes and projects a long flame perpendicularly.
  • Recharge Bonus: Allows you to recharge your special ability faster.
  • Speed Bonus: Allows you to move at the speed of light.
  • Mines: Be careful where you walk, one wrong step and it's the end for you because even the terrain could play tricks on you.
  • C4: a little technological gem allowing you to make a good racket and good damage whenever and wherever you want.
  • Shield : Protects you from a deadly explosion...
